titleStmt.title: French court-aires, vvith their ditties Englished, of foure and fiue parts Together with that of the lute. Collected, translated, published by Ed: Filmer, Gent: dedicated to the Queene.
titleStmt.author: Guédron, Pierre, ca. 1565-ca. 1621.
Bataille, Gabriel, 1575-1630. aut
Boesset, Anthoyne. aut
Filmer, Edward, Sir, 1565 or 6-1629.

notesStmt.note: A collection of works by Pierre Guédron and Anthoyne Boesset, with most of the lute accompaniments by Gabriel Bataille. With the French text of the lyrics at the end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
